originalText.text: Dr Gold is very informative, helpful and friendly. She took her time to explain the work she was doing on my upper back and planed appointments accordingly to my insurance coverage and my situation. The receptionist also is very welcoming and knowledgeable in her specialists. I absolutely feel comfortable going there again when needed.

text.text: Dr Gold is very informative, helpful and friendly. The receptionist also is very welcoming and knowledgeable in her specialists. I absolutely feel comfortable going there again when needed.

originalText.text: Dr Gold provided excellent service for many years, however the billing practices at the office now include an outside service that has very poor communication with patients that borders on fraudulent. My credit card on file was billed a full month after my last visit, without my knowledge. Explanations from the office state that they have difficulty in securing claims with the insurance company and instead pass the charge onto the patient when they no longer want to deal with it. Due diligence was not met by the billing department. Patient Beware, make sure your policy is accepted.

originalText.text: Dr. Gold and Dr. Merai were both incredible!  When I came in at 33 weeks pregnant complaining of pain, Dr. Gold was able to identify and treat the problem immediately. Both practitioners were knowledgeable, professional, and personable, and I felt very comfortable trusting them with my care even as I neared the end of my pregnancy. Nancy at the front desk was incredibly kind and helpful as well, and the practice was always able to accommodate my schedule. Within a few weeks I was pain-free! Highly recommend.

text.text: Dr. Gold and Dr. Merai were both incredible!  When I came in at 33 weeks pregnant complaining of pain, Dr. Gold was able to identify and treat the problem immediately. Both practitioners were knowledgeable, professional, and personable, and I felt very comfortable trusting them with my care even as I neared the end of my pregnancy. Nancy at the front desk was incredibly kind and helpful as well, and the practice was always able to accommodate my schedule. Within a few weeks I was pain-free! Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Great experience. I saw many different doctors because of extreme chronic pain and no one took the time to find out what the problem was. Dr. Gold looked at my back carefully, looked at x-rays and confirmed that there was a curvature that we needed to work on re-aligning. It was nice to see that someone was willing to find the root of the problem. Nancy at the front desk is always super sweet and very helpful.

originalText.text:
Gentle ,attentive ,and thorough ,
I went in  intense back pain and no idea why ,after wasting   my time by going to the ER, Dr.Gold went strait to the root of the problem and in a few days I went from not being able to walk to not having any pain for the first time in years .Ive also seen his Colleague Dr Meraia and shes also amazing at her job. The lovely Lady at the front desk is there to help with all concerns or navigating all of the questions and paperwork.
